ygData.subject: Re: Welcome to EQ_women@onelist.com
ygData.msgSnippet: I hate to say it, but I beleive that until you reach level 6, your corpse will only stay there for 30 minutes.  Even though its not very much fun, I find it
ygData.messageBody:
I hate to say it, but I beleive that until you reach level 6, your corpse will
only stay there for 30 minutes. Even though its not very much fun, I find it
good to stay near your city of origin until you hit level 6. That is when you
begin to have a week to retrieve your corpse. I have a level 2 human ranger
named Lanla on the Prexus server. Perhaps if we are on at the same time we
can adventure together.

>===== Original Message From EQ_women@onelist.com =====
>From: sgj <sgj31@...>
>
>Hello Everyone.
>
>I'm Tbaald, only a level 3 Half-Elf Ranger on the Prexus Server. Ever need
>a Tracker, give me a tell. Right now that's about all I can offer a group.
>:) I'm trying to make my way back to High Hold Pass to retrieve my corpse.
>( I believe I have a week of real time while I'm below Level 5 or 6. ) The
>group I was with got separated from me while zoning and I subsequently had
>no protectors when a Lion decided to take me out. I also had no one to loot
>my corpse for me and bring back my stuff.
>
>Looking forward to getting to know everyone here, and in the game.
>
>Tbaald
>
>------------------------------------------------------------------------
>Where do some of the Internet's largest email lists reside?
>http://www.onelist.com
>At ONElist - the most scalable and reliable service on the Internet.
